document.full_text: in turning over to brendan shanahan the duty of overseeing discipline and player safety, an n.h.l. vice president relinquishes duties that had always brought criticism.
document.title: saying no thanks to a thankless role
lines_and_colors: in turning over to brendan shanahan the duty of overseeing discipline and player safety, an n.h.l. vice president relinquishes duties that had always brought criticism.
